verses.verse: כְּרָפְאִ֣י <S%H7495><s%> When I would have healed לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְנִגְלָ֞ה <S%H1540><s%> was discovered עֲוֹ֤ן <S%H5771><s%> then the iniquity אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וְרָע֣וֹת <S%H7451><s%> and the wickedness שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for פָעֲל֖וּ <S%H6466><s%> for they commit שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsehood וְגַנָּ֣ב <S%H1590><s%> and the thief יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> cometh in פָּשַׁ֥ט <S%H6584><s%> of robbers spoileth גְּד֖וּד <S%H1416><s%> [and] the troop בַּחֽוּץ׃ <S%H2351><s%> without

וּבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> not יֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> And they consider לִלְבָבָ֔ם <S%H3824><s%> not in their hearts כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רָעָתָ֖ם <S%H7451><s%> all their wickedness זָכָ֑רְתִּי <S%H2142><s%> [that] I remember עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now סְבָב֣וּם <S%H5437><s%> have beset them about מַֽעַלְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4611><s%> now their own doings נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> are before פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> they are before my face הָיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

בְּרָעָתָ֖ם <S%H7451><s%> with their wickedness יְשַׂמְּחוּ־ <S%H8055><s%> glad מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> They make the king וּבְכַחֲשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H3585><s%> with their lies שָׂרִֽים׃ <S%H8269><s%> and the princes

כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> are all מְנָ֣אֲפִ֔ים <S%H5003><s%> They [are] all adulterers כְּמ֣וֹ <S%H3644><s%> Like תַנּ֔וּר <S%H8574><s%> as an oven בֹּעֵ֖רָה <S%H1197><s%> heated מֵֽאֹפֶ֑ה <S%H644><s%> by the baker יִשְׁבּ֣וֹת <S%H7673><s%> [who] ceaseth מֵעִ֔יר <S%H5782><s%> from raising מִלּ֥וּשׁ <S%H3888><s%> after he hath kneaded בָּצֵ֖ק <S%H1217><s%> the dough עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until חֻמְצָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2556><s%> until it be leavened

י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In the day מַלְכֵּ֔נוּ <S%H4428><s%> of our king הֶחֱל֥וּ <S%H2470><s%> have made [him] sick שָׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> the princes חֲמַ֣ת <S%H2573><s%> bottle מִיָּ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine מָשַׁ֥ךְ <S%H4900><s%> he stretched out יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with לֹצְצִֽים׃ <S%H3945><s%> with scorners

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> they קֵרְב֧וּ <S%H7126><s%> For they have made ready כַתַּנּ֛וּר <S%H8574><s%> like an oven לִבָּ֖ם <S%H3820><s%> their heart בְּאָרְבָּ֑ם <S%H693><s%> whiles they lie in wait כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <S%H3915><s%> all the night יָשֵׁ֣ן <S%H3462><s%> grow old אֹֽפֵהֶ֔ם <S%H644><s%> their baker בֹּ֕קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> it בֹעֵ֖ר <S%H1197><s%> it burneth כְּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire לֶהָבָֽה׃ <S%H3852><s%> as a flaming

כֻּלָּ֤ם <S%H3605><s%> All יֵחַ֙מּוּ֙ <S%H2552><s%> They are all hot כַּתַּנּ֔וּר <S%H8574><s%> as an oven וְאָכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> and have devoured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֹֽׁפְטֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8199><s%> their judges כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מַלְכֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4428><s%> all their kings נָפָ֔לוּ <S%H5307><s%> are fallen אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> None קֹרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> [there is] none among them that calleth בָהֶ֖ם אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

אֶפְרַ֕יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim בָּעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> himself among the people ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself יִתְבּוֹלָ֑ל <S%H1101><s%> he hath mixed אֶפְרַ֛יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has become עֻגָ֖ה <S%H5692><s%> is a cake בְּלִ֥י <S%H1097><s%> not הֲפוּכָֽה׃ <S%H2015><s%> not turned

אָכְל֤וּ <S%H398><s%> have devoured זָרִים֙ <S%H2114><s%> Strangers כֹּח֔וֹ <S%H3581><s%> his strength וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יָדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> and he knoweth גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also שֵׂיבָה֙ <S%H7872><s%> [it] not yea gray hairs זָ֣רְקָה <S%H2236><s%> are here and there בּ֔וֹ וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> does not יָדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> upon him yet he knoweth

וְעָנָ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> testifieth גְאֽוֹן־ <S%H1347><s%> And the pride יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> to his face וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor שָׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> and they do not return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> their God וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor בִקְשֻׁ֖הוּ <S%H1245><s%> nor seek בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> has become אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim כְּיוֹנָ֥ה <S%H3123><s%> dove פוֹתָ֖ה <S%H6601><s%> also is like a silly אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> without לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> without heart מִצְרַ֥יִם <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt קָרָ֖אוּ <S%H7121><s%> they call אַשּׁ֥וּר <S%H804><s%> to Assyria הָלָֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> they go

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they יֵלֵ֗כוּ <S%H1980><s%> go אֶפְר֤וֹשׂ <S%H6566><s%> I will spread עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> over רִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H7568><s%> my net כְּע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> as the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven אֽוֹרִידֵ֑ם <S%H3381><s%> upon them I will bring them down אַיְסִרֵ֕ם <S%H3256><s%> I will chastise כְּשֵׁ֖מַע <S%H8088><s%> hath heard לַעֲדָתָֽם׃ <S%H5712><s%> them as their congregation ס

א֤וֹי <S%H188><s%> Woe לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָדְד֣וּ <S%H5074><s%> unto them for they have fled מִמֶּ֔נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at שֹׁ֥ד <S%H7701><s%> from me destruction לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פָ֣שְׁעוּ <S%H6586><s%> unto them because they have transgressed בִ֑י וְאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> would אֶפְדֵּ֔ם <S%H6299><s%> against me though I have redeemed וְהֵ֕מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they דִּבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> them yet they have spoken עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> against כְּזָבִֽים׃ <S%H3577><s%> lies

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not זָעֲק֤וּ <S%H2199><s%> And they have not cried אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me בְּלִבָּ֔ם <S%H3820><s%> unto me with their heart כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> When יְיֵלִ֖ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> when they howled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> the sake מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4904><s%> upon their beds עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> the sake דָּגָ֧ן <S%H1715><s%> themselves for corn וְתִיר֛וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> and wine יִתְגּוֹרָ֖רוּ <S%H1481><s%> they assemble יָס֥וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> [and] they rebel בִֽי׃

וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יִסַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H3256><s%> Though I have bound חִזַּ֖קְתִּי <S%H2388><s%> [and] strengthened זְרֽוֹעֹתָ֑ם <S%H2220><s%> their arms וְאֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> against יְחַשְּׁבוּ־ <S%H2803><s%> yet do they imagine רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> mischief

יָשׁ֣וּבוּ ׀ <S%H7725><s%> They return לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not עָ֗ל <S%H5920><s%> [but] not to the most High הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּקֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> bow רְמִיָּ֔ה <S%H7423><s%> they are like a deceitful יִפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall בַחֶ֛רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword שָׂרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8269><s%> their princes מִזַּ֣עַם <S%H2195><s%> for the rage לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <S%H3956><s%> of their tongue ז֥וֹ <S%H2097><s%> this לַעְגָּ֖ם <S%H3933><s%> [shall be] their derision בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt
